title: lolclient.exe has stopped working after I log in and wait in the main screen
body:
After I log into the client, I will get a message lolclient.exe has stopped working and my client crashes. It's a random occurrence... sometimes it'll happen the exact moment after I log in, 5-10 seconds after, 2 minutes while waiting in the client, or when I'm creating a custom game. So far it hasn't happened in champion select luckily. But as I'm typing here, I can't even get into a game because my client has crashed 5 times in a row. Any idea how to solve this issue?

I've also noticed that after I finish a game and go to my hextech crafting, the game will just exit without a message.

replies.body: Your issue might be due to corrupt game files, which can cause your client to crash.  I agree with Rineyy here that the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) guide would be your best bet!  It will provide some instructions to help get this fixed up for you, including file repairs.  If your issues continue though, let me know and I'd be happy to help!

I am having the same issue as posted above. When i try and log on i get the lolclient.exe has stopped working. I followed the guide you posted but i haven't been able to fix the issue. I haven't had this issue until yesterday, which was weird since i was playing just hours before it started.
